nl.esciencecenter.xenon.adaptors.ftp

Class FtpCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.xenon.adaptors.ftp.FtpCommand
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FtpQuery

    public abstract class FtpCommand
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class for executing a single operation on an FTPClient that does not return anything. The wrapper takes care of checking the status after execution and throwing an exception if necessary.

      • isCodeSuccessfulCompletion

        public static boolean isCodeSuccessfulCompletion(int replyCode)
        Returns true if code is in interval [100,300). See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_FTP_server_return_codes.
        Parameters:
        replyCode -
        Returns:
        if code implies successful completion
